divs: Sighting DetailsIt was night time and I saw a glowing ball of fuzzy light fly very slow over my head,a few minutes later after it got out of sight I saw 2 fast jets that were very loud flying in the same path as the glowing UFO.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around July 15th 1978
Summary: round metalic silver colored, Glowing fuzzy oval ball of light.
